import React from 'react' import { Fade } from 'react-reveal'; const CountBar = ({ baseClass, items, isVertical, revealProps }) => (
{ items.map(({ count, labelTop, labelBottom}) => ( { revealProps.disabled ? <> { count } { labelTop } { labelBottom } : <> { count } { labelTop } { labelBottom } } )) }
) CountBar.defaultProps = { revealProps: { delay: 0, }, } export default CountBar
